title: Welcome to WikiClone
subtitle: A free encyclopedia built with React and Node.js
content:
## Welcome to WikiClone

WikiClone is a free, open-source encyclopedia that anyone can explore. This project is built with modern web technologies and serves as a demonstration of full-stack web development.

## Featured Articles

Explore our collection of articles on programming and web development:

- **[[React]]** — A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
- **[[Node.js]]** — A JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 engine
- **[[JavaScript]]** — The programming language of the web
- **[[Web Development]]** — The art of building websites and web applications
- **[[TypeScript]]** — A typed superset of JavaScript
- **[[Express]]** — A fast, minimalist web framework for Node.js
- **[[REST API]]** — An architectural style for building web services

## About This Project

This Wikipedia-like website was built using:

- **Frontend**: [[React]] with Vite for fast development
- **Backend**: [[Node.js]] with [[Express]] for the API server
- **Data Storage**: JSON files for article content
- **Styling**: Custom CSS inspired by Wikipedia's design

## How to Navigate

Use the **search bar** at the top to find articles, browse **categories** in the sidebar, or click the **Random Article** button to discover something new.
